column5: Thinking of taking the week off and trying to get that buck that I posted. I have a feelin they may start moving once this full moon is gone. Any ideas guys??? Rattling and doe in heat scent?
Too warm yet! Maybe towards the end of the week when it cools down a bit. Haven't had a buck come in to the grunt tube or rattles yet this year and that is strange for me.  Mark
Yea I have to agree.Woke up this morning to t-shirt temps.  I rattled on Saturday.Nada.
Try using a fawn this time of year.  Had success(once) when a doe came running with a big boy in tow.
